meanings.definition: Lacking a systematic or organized method
meanings.sent1: Her immethodical approach to cleaning often led to misplaced items.
meanings.sent2: The immethodical arrangement of the books made it hard to find the one she needed.
meanings.sent3: His immethodical way of packing for the trip resulted in forgetting essential items.
meanings.sent4: The immethodical nature of her thoughts resembled a tangled ball of yarn.
meanings.sent5: The immethodical chaos of the room was a testament to her busy schedule.

meanings.definition: Not following a specific order or plan
meanings.sent1: The immethodical schedule changes caused confusion among the team.
meanings.sent2: His immethodical approach to studying resulted in inconsistent grades.
meanings.sent3: The immethodical dance routine left the audience both puzzled and amused.
meanings.sent4: The immethodical flow of traffic resembled a flock of scattered birds.
meanings.sent5: Her immethodical painting style created a unique and unpredictable masterpiece.
